messages.title: You can change the country
messages.content: On 8th June you decide the future direction of Britain, Your choice could not be clearer or more important.

messages.title: A strong opposition with the Lib Dems.
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats are fighting for what's most important for families across Britain - jobs, health services and schools. The Lib Dems are tipped to win dozens of seats against the Conservatives this time at the polls to secure a strong opposition that will change the direction of the country.

messages.title: Or...A blank cheque for the Conservatives:
messages.content: Widowed parents being hit again by Tory cuts to bereavement benefits. The country heading in the wrong direction.

messages.title: Labour are out of the race and too weak to deliver real change...
messages.content: "There is no realistic chance of us winning" - Labour MP Alan Johnson, 22 April 2017 "Labour fear election bloodbath as a QUARTER of MPs face losing their seats" - Mirror, 20 April 2017

messages.title: ...Whilst Plaid Cymru can't win in a nationwide election

quotes.text: Widowed parents are being hit again by Tory cuts to bereavement benefits.
The country heading in the wrong direction.
"There is no realistic chance of us winning"
"Labour fear election bloodbath as a QUARTER of MPs face losing their seats"
